<a href="reader.html?chapter=epilogue_b", style="color:var(--background-light);">I want to see Shinjuku Academy and other possibilities.

text:
At this unexpected answer, his sharp eyes flew wide open.
The joy came late, and a huge grin slowly filled his face.

name: Jagannath
text:
—Whoa, double schooling?
That's the most grueling path of all!?

name: Jagannath
text:
Just who the hell did you learn from to
come to such an amazingly stupid conclusion?

options.text: I wonder who that could be?
Someone who's obsessed with keeping two positions, perhaps?
Jagannath, if you can do it, so can I.

name: Jagannath
text:
Haha, playing dumb now, are you?
That's the attitude of someone truly greedy, selfish, and independent.

name: Jagannath
text:
God, I did say I wanted someone who could stand by me,
but what kind of idiot copies me that much?

He laughed with a rough breath and looked up at the night sky.
After a short but heat-filled silence, he said with a mischievous grin—

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh. Well then, I'll be counting on
you for a long time to come— my Buddy.

Just as it seemed he would wrap his arm around [Player]'s shoulder,
he brought his face close and bared his teeth in a grin.
Their pure white breath melted together into the crisp, cold air.

Behind them, their footprints stretched back through the snow—
And, ahead of them, the fresh, untouched white extended forever.

Christmas Street Fight
～Ruthless Winter Festival Struggle!～
—END—
